body_html: After submitting the ticket and thinking about it I realised that it was not the batch size that was causing it, but rather missing singleton dimension in the weights, so the weights tensor should have been [1, Height, Width, 1] and squeezing is applied on the channel dimension. Doing that fixed the issue. Sorry for the inconvenience! I will close the issue.

body: After submitting the ticket and thinking about it I realised that it was not the batch size that was causing it, but rather missing singleton dimension in the weights, so the weights tensor should have been [1, Height, Width, 1] and squeezing is applied on the channel dimension. Doing that fixed the issue. Sorry for the inconvenience! I will close the issue.
